title: The minimum clear headroom in pedestrian area such as walkways, halls, corridors, passageways or aisles shall be 2
clause_text: The minimum clear headroom in pedestrian area such as walkways, halls, corridors, passageways or aisles shall be 2.2 m.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The minimum clear headroom in pedestrian area such as walkways, halls, corridors, passageways or aisles shall be 2.2 m.
